text.description:
Today Parisian Vibe and Lea are strolling the streets of Paris to show you our 5 best coffee shops in Paris. These authentic cafes were handpicked by the team and Lea for you to discover whether you are visiting or living in Paris. Our main criteria was (of course) good coffee and cool company. It is not just another “cup of coffee”, each place has something special about it. Go get your cup of coffee and let us know what you think. *NOTE: FRENCH SUBTITLES AVAILABLE* ___________ *ADDRESSES OF THE COFFEE SHOPS:*
• Coffee Place No 1 - KB Coffee Roasters: 53 Av. Trudaine, 75009 Paris Follow on instagram ►► https://instagram.com/kbcoffeeroastersparis
• Coffee Place No 2 - Blackbird Coffee: 54 Rue des Trois Frères, 75018 Paris Follow on instagram ►► https://instagram.com/blackbirdcoffee.official
• Coffee Place No 3 - The Beans on Fire: 61 Rue des Trois Frères, 75018 Paris Follow on instagram ►► https://instagram.com/thebeansonfire
• Coffee Place No 4 - Noir Coffee Shop: 120 Bd Haussmann, 75008 Paris Follow on instagram ►► https://instagram.com/noir_coffeeshop
• Coffee Place No 5 - Café Kitsuné: 208 Rue de Rivoli, 75001 Paris Follow on instagram ►► https://instagram.com/cafekitsune ___________ Production ►► ParisianVibe Art Direction ►► ParisianVibe Sound ►►ParisianVibe Editing ►► ParisianVibe Follow Léa on instagram ►► https://instagram.com/leajplf Follow Léa on youtube ►► @LeaJplf Listen Léa's Simple Cafeine Podcast ►► http://bit.ly/3jPL6iO Follow Parisianvibe on instagram ►► https://instagram.com/parisianvibe ___________ *DISCOVER MORE:* • Best Rooftop Bars in Paris: https://youtu.be/FqNdT9IuZto • Best Croissants in Paris: https://youtu.be/JG1zkvwrn3E • At Home in Paris with a Journalist: https://youtu.be/gfl8Zso95mY • Paris Tour with a New Yorker: https://youtu.be/QpkaJ5YuxaM ___________ 00:00 Intro 00:16 Coffee Shop 1: KB Coffee Roasters 02:19 Coffee Shop 2: Blackbird Coffee 03:26 Coffee Shop 3: The Beans on Fire 03:57 Chat with the Colombian founder of "The Beans on Fire" 07:03 Coffee Shop 4: Noir Coffee Shop 08:17 Coffee Shop 5: Café Kitsuné
Note: If you love the video, please leave a like to support us👍🏻and leave a comment to inspire us✍ Disclaimer: This is not a sponsored video and we all always mention sponsored videos. #coffee #paris #parisianvibe
text.fulltitle: Best Coffee Shops in Paris to Visit in 2023 | Parisian Vibe
text.tags: best coffee shops in paris; coffee in paris; paris cafe; paris coffee shop; paris coffee; Lea Jplf; vlog paris; paris france; best cafe in paris; paris cafe tour; french coffee shop; coffee in france; france coffee; cafe in paris; paris france tour; paris vlog; cafe kitsune; parisian life; parisian cafe; parisian vibe;
